name: The Shadow Warrior
description:
A Short 5 level game made for the 3 Hour Trijam Game Jam. Went up to 5 hours with adding levels and menus and music. You must crouch behind boulders or get caught

Music is just 1 repeating short koto loop I made at midnight sorry if it gets annoying.

Palette created by and background art heavily based on this art https://lospec.com/palette-list/twilight-5 . Sorry

All other art is 100% original

CONTROLS:

AD or LeftRight Arrows move left and right

CTRL or S or Down Arrow to crouch

Space to kill from short range
